name: [Campaign] Starcraft 2: Ambivalence
description:
## Current Status

AmbivalenceÂ will not be continued until the first act of Shadow of Liberty is finished.

## How To Play The Map

Watch this link to play the maps [here](<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AltjnZfM12I&list=PLlC8YfRpYfL2J4fO2CO_WcsAC23QSeQ37>)



## Custom Campaign Initiative

For the Custom Campaign Initiative, click [here](<https://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/custom-campaign-initiative/>)

## Story

The year is 2508, and the Dominion are hard-pressed by Feral Zerg attacks and the Defenders of Man. The Zerg Swarm have been infesting worlds close to Char, securing resources to remain prominent on the power structure. The Protoss have been rebuilding their once great civilization. Artanis as created a new government called the Enclave. As the Enclave establishes a loose grip over Aiur, some provinces have gone dark. Reports say this is the work of their Nerazim brothers.

## Special Thanks

- Thrikodias for models

<!-- -->

## Features

- You will play as the Nerazim Protoss in this campaign.
- You will have a choice on what difficulty you would like to play on. Easy, Standard, Challenging, Extreme.

<!-- -->

## Missions

- 01: The United Order - Planning
- 02: Allies - Planning
- 03: Sabotage - Planning
- Cinematic - The Slums - Planning
- 04: Test of Strength - Planning
- 05: Enforcing Justice - Planning
- 06: Forlorn - Planning
- 07: Broken Faith - Planning
